channel.title: Stock Buybacks on Rob Barry
channel.description: Recent content in Stock Buybacks on Rob Barry

item.title: Executive Sales Beat News That Hit Stock
item.description: A medical-supplies company made a $43 million repurchase of its own shares last year, buoying the stock before bad news hit, even as four top managers were selling company shares. A medical-supplies firm repurchased a significant amount of its own shares, boosting the stock’s value, while four top executives sold their company shares. A month later, the stock experienced a 9% drop following the announcement of poor earnings. Some employees within the firm expressed concerns about the trading activities.
